DOC.brief_summary: This study design test two hypothesis : 1 . The PADnet+ test system produce clinically equivalent result Parks Flo-Lab test system group patient refer evaluation PAD limbs perform Registered Vascular Technologist ( RVT ) . 2 . The PADnet+ test system produce clinically equivalent result test repeated patient performed staff specifically train use PADnet+ system vascular technologist hold RVT certification .
